Plot / Synopsis:

A science fiction adaptation of Pierre Boulle's novel, The Planet of the Apes (NOT THE MOVIE!). The Original Comic Book was both written and drawn by ErnÃ…â€˜ ZÃƒÂ³rÃƒÂ¡d, Hungarian Comic Book -legend, and unfortunately he never had the chance to colour his work, as was usual in his later releases.

An ENG translation of ErnÃ…â€˜ ZÃƒÂ³rÃƒÂ¡d's Majmok BolygÃƒÂ³ja is already circulating on the net for some time now, made by British gentlemen, titled: Monkey Planet, but since that translation did not respect the text of the original work, I felt compelled to do another... 

The scan was provided by kyriee, proof-reading was done by avoros. ThanxXx for their helps!

Check SWATura torrents for other hard-to-find classics!
